alert.note: Alert for Russell; Washington; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 7:33PM EDT until August 10 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Virginia, including the following counties, Russell, Washington and Wise. * WHEN...Until 915 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 730 PM EDT, Light to moderate rain continues to fall over portions of the advisory area. Minor flooding is expected to remain possible. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Abingdon, Lebanon, Cleveland Va, Coeburn, Glade Spring, Honaker, Pound, St. Paul, Damascus, Hansonville, Holston, Rosedale, Lindell, Castlewood, Dye, Emory-Meadow View, Konnarock and Pardee. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
